State.Author: Bloc
State.Description: Don't want your hard-earned achievements to be locked because you are using mods? This mod can fix that. This is a "mod" that blocks Bannerlord blocking you to get achievements because you use mods. A mod that unblocks mod-blocks. Also, with this mod, you don't need to use Story Mode to earn achievements. You can earn it with Sandbox version too.
State.Name: Achievement Un(bloc)ker

State.Author: Basileus
State.Description: BKCE is a full game overhaul powered by Banner Kings: map, troop, faction, culture overhauls, 9 new cultures to pick from, tons of cultural flavouring through more than a dozen religions, descriptions, languages, titles and more. All lore-based, the ultimate version of extended vanilla Bannerlord.
State.Name: Banner Kings Cultures Expanded

State.Author: Crepitate
State.Description: Simple UI Change
State.Name: Bulders UI

State.Author: Spinozart1
State.Description:
"Fourberie" is a French word that can be translated in many ways, but the one that would fit the best (for this mod) is "cunning".

Here you will get access to a large panel of features allowing you to experience new playstyles.

Develop a rogue character or simply use dirty tactics and schemes to dominate the world of Calradia...
State.Name: Fourberie (Cunning)

State.Author: Kadvor
State.Description: This mod extends crafting categories with pieces from another categories (f.e. 1h axe heads in 2h category), and adds few new crafting parts. Compatible with most crafting mods.
State.Name: Just Let Me Smith

State.Author: Litauen
State.Description: Mute Lords be gone! Lords in the heat of battle are not faceless units anymore. They taunt, insult you and react to your actions!
State.Name: Nemesis

State.Author: ShutUpMalfoy
State.Description: This mod adds more banners to the battlefield.
State.Name: Raise your Banner

State.Author: BUTR Team
State.Description: Rewritten fork of UIExtenderLib with the similar goal of enabling multiple mods to alter standard game interface.
State.Name: UIExtenderEx

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: Scorilos
State.Description:
This is a pack that contains armor from antiquity from BC up to the 2nd century AD.

If you have any sugestions regarding new assets feel free to join  Ancient Civilization Discord  https://discord.gg/tBd5hqbKjp
State.Name: Ancient Civilizationss

State.Author: Artem
State.Description: This mod adds new idles, injury mechanic, fleeing mechanic, custom one-handed spear & shield animations to Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord.
State.Name: Artems Lively Animations

State.Author: Bloc
State.Description: Implementation of a Better Banner Editor. Editor that we all deserve since the beginning of EA. This implementation is almost identical to website bannerlord.party and pre-release version that most of you didn't have a chance to see. Supports Copy-paste banner codes and color persistence for player banners out of the box.
State.Name: Banner Editor

State.Author: ShutUpMalfoy
State.Description: Fixes many things related to banners. This mod fix the unnatural banner.
State.Name: Banner Fix

State.Author: Basileus TheUnknown Sval Carrasco
State.Description: Banner Kings is a suite of features to deepen non-combat gameplay. Populations, feudal titles, village projects, settlement management overhaul & more.
State.Name: Banner Kings

State.Author: Basileus TheUnknown Sval Carrasco
State.Description: Banner Kings is a suite of features to deepen non-combat gameplay. Populations, feudal titles, village projects, settlement management overhaul & more.
State.Name: Banner Kings

State.Author: Cheyron
State.Description: A bunch of useful features I have put together to fix all the stupid sh!t going on in my game. I also included a bunch of stuff I think TW did wrong or completely forgot to do. Also included are a bunch of trainer options in a menu that let you take control of many functions in Bannerlord.
State.Name: Bannerlord Trainer Plus (Formerly Campaign Helper)

State.Author: SkaLoLaz
State.Description: A port of the Better Smithing mod to the latest game version. Better Smithing attempts to fix everything wrong with the smithing menus, and also offers configurable quality of life improvements when Forging, including batch Smelting/Refining/Crafting, Automatically adding Tier prefixes to crafted weapons, Saveable weapon design and more.
State.Name: Better Smithing Continued

State.Author: Snorri
State.Description:
This mod brings to the game new: 1 town, 3 castles and 13 new villages.

And remodel mostly nonsense distribution of old ones (Huge change)



This mod use scenes hidden in game filles, made by me personnaly, and some scenes from Scene Design Contest, from witch some I fixed and finished.
State.Name: Castles restored

State.Author: cnedwin _ Ko4evnik
State.Description:
This is the best visual character editor for Mount & Blade II Bannerlord at present.

You can modify the hero's level, attribute points, skills, focus points, traits and personality

Enables detailed character customization options, such as weight, build, and age and the ability to .modify NPC appearances!
State.Name: Character Reload Fix for e(1.7.X - 1.9.0)  v(1.0.X-1.2.3)

State.Author: Artem
State.Description: This mod adds matched combat, killmoves, bleed-out states, mercy kills, masterstrikes and shield taunt mechanics to Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord
State.Name: Cinematic Combat

State.Author: Cimo
State.Description: A mod that helps you build the best weapon in smithing by custom sorting the parts.
State.Name: Crafting Piece Sorter

State.Author: TA Team
State.Description:
This is the EOE Flavour Pack, in a Collab with EOE, Empires of Europe 1100AD..(Before known as Orbis Terra Armarium and Expanded Bannerlord Armoury).

Adds a pack of armors, helmets, weapons, etc.



More pictures coming later, or check the Discord :)

https://discord.gg/ZjFWXka8me
State.Name: EOE Flavour Pack

State.Author: SKatagiri
State.Description: Updated Helmet Hair Cover Tweaks, high compatibility with RBM, OSA, and others, easy installation, 日本語の説明文あり
State.Name: Helmet Hair Cover Tweaks  Expanded

State.Author: Cheyron
State.Description: Now you can hold court in your keep! Notables from your settlement and attached villages will present their problems to you! You rule, they need to come to you!
State.Name: Hold Court

State.Author: Ulfkarl
State.Description: If you are bored of the same monotone TW native battlecries in battle then this mod is for you. It replaces the battlecries with the ones from the game Mordhau.
State.Name: Mordhau Voices in battle

State.Author: ShutUpMalfoy
State.Description: When acquire a relationship point, this mod don't let them have an exaggerated smile.
State.Name: No Big Smiles

State.Author: The Open Source Armory Team
State.Description:
The #1 stop for all your custom armor needs!

Combines existing popular armor mods.

Adds 1,600+ new custom armors!

Adds 83 new shields and 148 weapons!

Compatible with 1.1.0 and later versions.

Largest custom armor pack so far!
State.Name: Open Source Armory

Original.Name: Open Source Armory - Realistic Battle Mod Patch-2829-1-18-1-1723115687.zip

State.Author: The Open Source Armory Team
State.Description:
The #1 stop for all your custom armor needs!

Combines existing popular armor mods.

Adds 1,600+ new custom armors!

Adds 83 new shields and 148 weapons!

Compatible with 1.1.0 and later versions.

Largest custom armor pack so far!
State.Name: Open Source Armory

State.Author: The Open Source Armory Team
State.Description:
The #1 stop for all your custom armor needs!

Combines existing popular armor mods.

Adds 1,600+ new custom armors!

Adds 83 new shields and 148 weapons!

Compatible with 1.1.0 and later versions.

Largest custom armor pack so far!
State.Name: Open Source Armory

State.Author: ShutUpMalfoy
State.Description: Fire arrows for night battles.
State.Name: Perfect Fire Arrows

Original.Name: Realistic Battle Mod for 1.2.10 live and 1.2.11 B-791-3-8-9-1730585509.zip

State.Author: Marnah93 and Philozoraptor
State.Description: This mod makes combat more realistic. Armor and damage is reworked according to experimental data. Weapons attack faster. Units parry and block more. Projectile damage is based on kinetic energy, ranged weapons use draw and projectile weight based simulation. AI tactics improved. Units climb ladders during siege. Optional unit overhaul included.
State.Name: Realistic Battle Mod

State.Author: ShutUpMalfoy
State.Description: This mod enhances the Bannerlord combat system by allowing nearby AI parties or armies to join your battle.
State.Name: Reinforcement System

State.Author: DDragoonz
State.Description: Make thrust attack can only be blocked by shield, parrying, or chamber blocking. Normal block will cause the attack to crush through enemy.
State.Name: Unblockable Thrust

State.Author: OrderWOPower
State.Description: Makes tournament participants all wear the same armor
State.Name: Balanced Tournament Armor

State.Author: NicoWaves _ Ko4evnik
State.Description: This mod adds 50+ cheats to the game - all configurable in an in-game menu - allowing you to modify the game difficulty to your liking and skipping grindy parts of the game.
State.Name: Bannerlord Cheats Reload

State.Author: BUTR Team
State.Description: The Bannerlord Software Extender (BLSE) is a tool for Bannerlord mods that expands modding capabilities and adds additional functionality to the game.
State.Name: Bannerlord Software Extender (BLSE)

State.Author: Bellum98b
State.Description: This Mod reviews the main problems of bannerlord2 workshops
State.Name: BEO_BetterWorkshop

State.Author: scorpion
State.Description: Butter Equipped is an equipment manager which automatically compares and upgrades equipment in your inventory, selecting the best option for each slot of equipment. Butter Equipped can also upgrade your entire party, saving time on equipping each companion individually.
State.Name: Butter Equipped

State.Author: BUTR Team
State.Description: Extension library for Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord containing common functions for modification development.
State.Name: ButterLib

State.Author: DDragoonz
State.Description: Allow you to pick up dropped weapon / ammo without aiming
State.Name: Easy Weapon Pickup

State.Author: Aragas
State.Description:
A library for patching, replacing and decorating .NET and Mono methods during runtime.



Intended to ensure that all mods in a player's modlist are using the latest version of Harmony to minimize conflicts.

We also added a Debug UI! Available via CTRL+ALT+H.
State.Name: Harmony

State.Author: Bloc
State.Description: Horses mod introduces the ability to select your own horse with any coat color you desire. It allows you to bond with your mount, giving you the option to name it and kick your enemies. Higher bonding level will also increase its skills. You can whistle and call your horse at your convenience and refill your ammo from the horse's quiver.
State.Name: Horses

State.Author: TadasTheLithuanian
State.Description: Troops lose/gain morale when their lords, formation captains, and generals fall in battle while the opposing team yells in rage and excitement. Safe to add/remove anytime.
State.Name: Knocked Down Heroes Influences Troops

State.Author: Larmantine
State.Description: Have you actually ever visited any towns? This very simple mod (for now) will address that bannerlord is less of a menu simulator, and more of an immersive game by addressing and justifying the work of sceners and devs at TW, that simply gets overlooked. The player is able to do almost everything in town, what can be achieved in the menu.
State.Name: Less menus - More immersion

Original.Name: Mavs Expand Your Clan - For Version 1.2.9-6256-1-0-6-4-1707482613.7z

State.Author: Morbid Mav
State.Description: Expand your clan by allowing you to recruit villagers and townsfolk as companions, Adopt children from the streets (of towns and villages), recruit freed bandit prisoners as a companions by speaking to the Ransom Broker in the tavern and ask your companions to become your sworn sibling as part of your clan.
State.Name: Mav's Expand Your Clan

State.Author: Phill544
State.Description: Introduce random events to your campaign! These may help or hinder your hero with many different scenarios and will occur periodically throughout the game. Hope you’re feeling lucky!
State.Name: Random Events

State.Author: JungleDruid
State.Description: A modular tool for cleaning up unused data and reducing save bloat in Bannerlord. Supports addons for extended compatibility with other mods.
State.Name: Save Cleaner

State.Author: cimo
State.Description: A mod that allows to see how far away the destination settlement(town, castle, village) is, without back to worldmap.
State.Name: Settlement Map

State.Author: Snorri
State.Description: Boundle of Snorri scenes matched for Banner Kings Cultures Extended
State.Name: Snorri scenes for BKCE

State.Author: SK
State.Description: Talk to any hero from encyclopedia.
State.Name: Telepathy

State.Author: ShutUpMalfoy
State.Description: Handle pesky bandits all at once with ease.
State.Name: Bandit Black Hole

State.Author: Basileus
State.Description: BKCE is a full game overhaul powered by Banner Kings: map, troop, faction, culture overhauls, 9 new cultures to pick from, tons of cultural flavouring through more than a dozen religions, descriptions, languages, titles and more. All lore-based, the ultimate version of extended vanilla Bannerlord.
State.Name: Banner Kings Cultures Expanded

State.Author: OrderWOPower
State.Description: Adds functionality for quick loading and incremental quick saving, as well as auto saving before and after battles
State.Name: Better Save and Load

State.Author: Bloc
State.Description: This mod lets you experience dialogues and snippets spoken by villagers, townsmen, and even soldiers. It adds a whopping 2,043 new lines to the game. It also increases the town population density.
State.Name: Alive Scenes

State.Author: kutilla
State.Description: This mod adds an extra features to hideouts
State.Name: Hideout Plus

State.Author: Piconi
State.Description: Adds 564 historically inspired symbols and around 50 colors to the banner editor!
State.Name: Historical Banner Icons

State.Author: ShutUpMalfoy
State.Description: Torches for night battles. Don't fight in the dark anymore.
State.Name: Raise your Torch

State.Author: Brandon
State.Description: Makes Tournaments Awesome
State.Name: Tournaments XPanded (The Tournament XPerience)

State.Author: Daneel53
State.Description: French translation of Open Source Armory, Saddlery and Weaponry.
State.Name: Open Source Armory - Traduction francaise

State.Author: Daneel53
State.Description: French translation of Open Source Armory, Saddlery and Weaponry.
State.Name: Open Source Armory - Traduction francaise

State.Author: Clickers2223
State.Description:
Tested on the 1.1.3 Main Branch. This mod simply adds a relationship gain to random notables in close by towns and villages when you defeat bandits, in a similar way to destroying bandit hideouts. 



Now configurable!
State.Name: Kill Bandits Raise Relations

State.Author: Bloc
State.Description: Implementation of a Better Banner Editor. Editor that we all deserve since the beginning of EA. This implementation is almost identical to website bannerlord.party and pre-release version that most of you didn't have a chance to see. Supports Copy-paste banner codes and color persistence for player banners out of the box.
State.Name: Banner Editor

State.Author: aj11131
State.Description: Adds some much needed beef to many of the bow models.
State.Name: Beefier Bows

State.Author: Ulfkarl
State.Description: Aesthetic mod that enhances the cultural diversity of the people in the Calradian world within the game. Taking inspiration from historically accurate real-world cultures to give each faction's people unique and distinct physic appareance.
State.Name: Culture Diversity Mod

State.Author: TadasTheLithuanian
State.Description: Shows you notifications when your party's smithing stamina is replenished + additional features. Safe to add/remove anytime.
State.Name: Visible Smithing Stamina While Waiting

State.Author: OrderWOPower
State.Description: Gives pikes realistic lengths, fixes the pike bracing animation so that the longer pikes can hit enemy cavalry, and makes pikemen use pike formations that are as functional as the game allows
State.Name: Better Pikes

State.Author: Aragas
State.Description:
Fixes the issue of not being able to use a horse when entering a Castle or Town. Companions can use horses too! Also makes cloth/leather based Horse Harnesses civilian.

Don't forget to assign a horse in Civil Clothes section!
State.Name: Enter Castle and Town with a Horse

State.Author: int19h
State.Description: Displays relation change notifications in the game log, instead of popups with annoying sound.
State.Name: No Relation

State.Author: Bloc
State.Description: This mod enhances immersion by adding 467 situation-based dialogue lines to NPCs, making their interactions more dynamic and reflective of your actions. Additionally, it introduces a new ambition system that gives lords and ladies distinct personalities and goals, influencing their behavior on the campaign map.
State.Name: Complex Characters

State.Author: ShutUpMalfoy
State.Description:
The sergeant of each formation repeat and pass commands.

Soldiers yell out when issue a charge order and adds horn sound to the battlefield.
State.Name: Immersive Battlefields

State.Author: GP0007
State.Description:
Traduction français du mode 'Serve as Soldier'

Il se peut que la traduction soit inexacte, n'hésitez pas à faire un post si vous avez un doute.
State.Name: Serve as soldier - Traduction Francaise

State.Author: Daneel53
State.Description: French translation of Open Source Armory, Saddlery and Weaponry.
State.Name: Open Source Armory - Traduction francaise

State.Author: Cheyron
State.Description: Makes AI fleeing from battle that get attacked from close range actually be smart and fight back.
State.Name: AI Defend Yourself

State.Author: AxelCawe
State.Description: This mod hopes to expand on companions, where more interactions with them are added.
State.Name: Bannerlord Expanded - Companion Expanded

State.Author: OrderWOPower
State.Description: Adds options to skip the splash screen, campaign intro, character creation and tutorial
State.Name: Useful Skips

State.Author: CaptSinnBadd
State.Description: A compatibility patch for players using the Banner Kings Cultures Expanded & Better Pikes mod.
State.Name: BKCE - Better Pikes Patch

State.Author: Ulfkarl
State.Description: A simple visual mod that fixes holsters for polearms, two handed swords and two handed axes, to make them more historically accurate and practical. If you love immersion and realism then this mod is for you.
State.Name: Realistic Practical Holsters

Original.Name: EOE Flavour Pack RBM Patch 3.5.1 Shields Fix-7528-3-5-1-1742864571.7z

State.Author: The Frogman
State.Description:
RBM patch for V3 of the EOE flavour pack. Armour values have been calculated from the RBM articles on how to make an RBM patch for an armour mod.

Huge thanks to Spades (espada) for going through all the XMLs and articles to help with this. And a huge thanks to Philippe Ramelet for having some brains to figure out the Saddlery XML.
State.Name: EOE Flavour Pack V3.5 RBM Patch

State.Author: Aragas
State.Description: MCM is a Mod Options screen library designed to let modders use its API for defining the options.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: Ahao221
State.Description: "Pickitup" is an AI optimization mod for Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord that enhances battlefield realism. It ensures soldiers who lose their weapons in combat don't fight unarmed like fools. Added feature to prevent dropped items from disappearing on the battlefield. Works well with other mods that have combat weapon drops.
State.Name: Pick It up-Agent Optimization

State.Author: Daneel53
State.Description: Traduction française du mod  Banner Kings pour Mount&Blade II: Bannerlord.
State.Name: Banner Kings - Traduction francaise

Original.Name: Better Clan Banners - POC Randomizer Config-5749-1-0-0-1689870685.zip

State.Author: Trypano9
State.Description:
Updates all vanilla clan banners with more detail, imagery, and color. 

Contains a config.json file to be used with the POC color randomizer mod. It preserves all original clan symbols and general kingdom colors as vanilla, but are now interesting and provide more color and detail for banners and shields on the battlefield. Immersive!
State.Name: Better Clan Banners - POC Randomizer config

State.Author: AxelCawe
State.Description: Nothing to do during peace time? This mod adds more time wasting interactions for your settlements!
State.Name: Bannerlord Expanded - Settlement Interactions

State.Author: enisn and Bildric
State.Description: This mod will allow you to quickly toggle the "Show Banners On Friendly Troops" option without having to go into the game settings. Pressing the key that is bound to "Show Indicators" (Left Alt by default) will toggle the state of the banner icons as long as you hold the key. Pressing the Right Alt key will switch the setting in the options.
State.Name: Friendly Troop Banner Hotkeys (Updated)

State.Author: Leohboo
State.Description:
Leoh's Bannerking tweaks

Fixes some naked NPC's, able to do grand heists in vanilla culture towns, working perks for Warrior's diet, spartan, promises. Minor changes to a few bandit troops
State.Name: Leoh's BK BKCE Tweaks

State.Author: Bloc
State.Description: A simple mod that changes the look of the settlement names. Adds relationship indicator as well as unique color to each faction.
State.Name: Settlement Icons - Redesign

Original.Name: I Dont Care - Campaign Log Filter-2175-2-8-1-1717511416.zip

State.Author: PajTajster
State.Description: Filter out useless information in Campaign Log.
State.Name: I Dont Care - Campaign Log Filter

State.Author: RG
State.Description:
Add more prisoner interaction.

And made persuation more interesting.

Feel free to advice to improve this mod together!
State.Name: MorePrisonerInteractions-Reborn

State.Author: DDragoonz
State.Description: Allow time passed during mission (Arena, walk in settlement, field battle, etc.)
State.Name: Time Pass

State.Author: OrderWOPower
State.Description: Adds rain/snow, fog and dust storms which affect movement speed, ranged weapon accuracy, AI shooter error and morale
State.Name: Realistic Weather

State.Author: Basileus TheUnknown Sval Carrasco
State.Description: Banner Kings is a suite of features to deepen non-combat gameplay. Populations, feudal titles, village projects, settlement management overhaul & more.
State.Name: Banner Kings

State.Author: quakank
State.Description: Fixes the many problems associated with custom banners, such as malformed banners on load, CTD in inventory and trade screens, banners being ruined by kingdom color updates, armor color mismatch caused by kingdom color updates. Latest versions now include integrated BannerPaste functionality!
State.Name: Banner Color Persistence (now with BannerPaste)

State.Author: Windwhistle
State.Description: Updated versions of Windwhistle's amazing mods.
State.Name: Windwhistle's Collection

State.Author: TheVigilantWolf2
State.Description: Become a mercenary while still holding a fief
State.Name: Mercenary With Fief

State.Author: The Open Source Armory Team
State.Description:
The #1 stop for all your custom armor needs!

Combines existing popular armor mods.

Adds 1,600+ new custom armors!

Adds 83 new shields and 148 weapons!

Compatible with 1.1.0 and later versions.

Largest custom armor pack so far!
State.Name: Open Source Armory

State.Author: JungleDruid
State.Description: A modular tool for cleaning up unused data and reducing save bloat in Bannerlord. Supports addons for extended compatibility with other mods.
State.Name: Save Cleaner

State.Author: conleyc86
State.Description: Like roleplaying? Wish there was a way to boast to your friends, compliment strangers and flirt with the lasses? Want to beat up your rival? Now you can! Develop relationships by making... small talk!
State.Name: Small Talk

Original.Name: Ancient Civilizations FullFix and RBM - CDt-6660-v1-0-1721495022.zip

State.Author: RisaCH
State.Description: This mod fixes many issues in Ancient Civilizations items XML files and adds RBM stats.
State.Name: Ancient Civilizations FullFix and RBM

State.Author: CaptSinnBadd
State.Description: A compatibility patch for players using the Banner Kings Cultures Expanded & True Menu Refinement Tool mod.
State.Name: BKCE - TMRT Patch

State.Author: OrderWOPower
State.Description: Makes polearms breakable
State.Name: Breakable Polearms

State.Author: CaptSinnBadd
State.Description: A compatibility patch for players using the Banner Kings Cultures Expanded & Breakable Polearms mod.
State.Name: BKCE - Breakable Polearms Patch

State.Author: Purple
State.Description: This mod allows to set freely the colors, banners and shields of each kingdom, clan or units:  specifically or randomized. You can have the units to wear their very own colors and banners (each of your companions or unit type for instance).
State.Name: POC color randomizer mod

State.Author: Windwhistle
State.Description: Updated versions of Windwhistle's amazing mods.
State.Name: Windwhistle's Collection

State.Author: Snah79
State.Description:
This mode autosorts troops and prisoners in Party screen.

Companions and family memebers in clan view are sorted as well. Even some help text is added in clan view.
State.Name: Troop Sorting

State.Author: Daneel53
State.Description: Traduction française du mod Butterlib.
State.Name: Butterlib - Traduction francaise

State.Author: Shadow32055
State.Description: Better Attributes aims to improve attributes by giving them bonuses that scale with their level. You can pick which bonuses are tied to what attribute as well as what you'd like the bonus to be.
State.Name: Better Attributes

State.Author: Marnah93 and Philozoraptor
State.Description:
Completely Cancel RBM`s Arm Shield

Shield is on the back regardless of whether or not the function is turned on in the settings
State.Name: Cancel RBMs Arm Shield

State.Author: Shadow32055
State.Description: Common functionality for my Better Series mods.
State.Name: Better Core

State.Author: OrderWOPower
State.Description: Fixes the thrust weapon preference setting in RBM to only affect thrusting, non-throwing polearms.
State.Name: Spear Preference Fix for RBM

State.Author: cnedwin _ Ko4evnik
State.Description:
This is the best visual character editor for Mount & Blade II Bannerlord at present.

You can modify the hero's level, attribute points, skills, focus points, traits and personality

Enables detailed character customization options, such as weight, build, and age and the ability to .modify NPC appearances!
State.Name: Character Reload Fix for e(1.7.X - 1.9.0)  v(1.0.X-1.2.3)

State.Author: OrderWOPower
State.Description: Enables surrender for lord parties and settlements, as well as displaying an enemy party/settlement's chance of surrender
State.Name: Surrender Tweaks

State.Author: RogueDemonKing
State.Description: Fixes hair disappearing for some male hairstyles with helmets that should show hair, where even if the helmet is configured to show hair, the game has no hair set to show.
State.Name: Missing Hair Fix

State.Author: Florian85V
State.Description: Traduction française pour le mod Surrender Tweaks.
State.Name: Surrender Tweaks FR

State.Author: Daneel53
State.Description: Traduction française du mod UIExtenderEX.
State.Name: UIExtenderEX - Traduction francaise

State.Author: Daneel53
State.Description: Traduction française de Mod Configuration Menu.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu - Traduction francaise

State.Author: Geeksoldiers51
State.Description: Traduction du mod better pike en français
State.Name: Better pike traduction FR
